<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Martial Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2949) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 75 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Magus](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=95)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Martial Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2946)

</column>

---

You gain one [magus feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=17/feats). For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your magus level is equal to half your character level.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another magus feat.
name: Advanced Martial Magic
